name: Flat fights
description:
A student project I made at The Danish Design school for the first semester.

"Flat Fights is a simple humorous player versus player game, where two polar opposites fight each other for control of their shared apartment. The game play and art style is an homage to the glory days of browser based flash games, and tries to emulate the same style and humor"

Jakob Bang (Bantle):
Programming
Implementation
Game Design

Søren Tang:
Character Design
Art style
Animation
Sound
Poster

Rune Forchhammer:
Background Art
Art style

The game is played by two people on one keyboard.
